page.title: 15Tap Dancing Class, Woking.
page.content: On Tuesday evenings I go to Tap Dancing with Mrs Walker. The class is in a Church Hall attached to the Church of the Good Shepherd in Pyrford. When we arrive there at 5.40pm I have to wait for my sister's class to start and finish so I take a book to read. When our class starts Mrs Walker takes the register then we have a warm up. There are nine girls in the class.Most of us wear brightly coloured leotards or cat suits but some girls wear shorts and tops. We all wear tap shoes which have steel pieces on the tips of the toes and heels. The pianist, Mrs Oxley, is very good because she has been there a long time. At the end of each term we have a show when our parents come to see what we have been doing during the term.
